official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to extend benefits to former employees of county committees established pursuant to section 8(b) of the Soil Conservation and Domestic Allotment Act, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Extends to former employees of county soil conservation committees who are employed by any Federal agency specified civil service compensation, leave, and seniority benefits afforded to former employees of such county committees employed by the Department of Agriculture.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to extend benefits to former employees of county committees established pursuant to section 8(b) of the Soil Conservation and Domestic Allotment Act, and for other purposes.
